name: inside-out-monitor-client
description: Client for sending encrypted heartbeats to monitor server

scripts.build: npm run bundle && pkg ../dist/client-bundle.cjs --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output ../dist/heartbeat-client && npm run build:ping && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:win: npm run bundle && pkg ../dist/client-bundle.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output ../dist/heartbeat-client-win.exe && npm run build:ping:win && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:linux: npm run bundle && pkg ../dist/client-bundle.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --output ../dist/heartbeat-client-linux && npm run build:ping:linux && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:macos: npm run bundle && pkg ../dist/client-bundle.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64 --output ../dist/heartbeat-client-macos && npm run build:ping:macos && npm run cleanup
